text: Tekla is a Latvian, Polish, Rusyn, and Scandinavian feminine given name. ==Notable people named Tekla== *Tekla Bądarzewska-Baranowska (1829/1834 to 1861), Polish composer *Tekla Chemabwai (born 1950), Kenyan sprinter and middle distance runner *Tekla Griebel-Wandall (1866–1940), Danish composer and music educator *Tekla Nordström (1856–1937), Swedish xylographer *Tekla Róża Radziwiłł (1703–1747), Polish-Lithuanian noblewoman == References == Category:Latvian feminine given names Category:Polish feminine given names Category:Swedish feminine given names Category:Feminine given names
title: Tekla (given name)
